Interface ShortstoryRepository

All Superinterfaces:

public interface ShortstoryRepository
extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Shortstory,​java.lang.Long>
Interface, that extends Spring Boots database capabilities for object: Shortstory

      @Query(value="SELECT * FROM Shortstory s WHERE s.title ILIKE CONCAT(\'%\', ?1, \'%\') ORDER BY s.id DESC", nativeQuery=true) java.util.List<Shortstory> findByTitle​(java.lang.String title)
